title: Open Source Intelligence (OSINT) Fusion
description: An OSINT analyst must fuse social media posts, news reports, and satellite imagery to assess battle damage after a strike.

tasks.description: Analyze post-strike satellite imagery to identify visible damage to the target.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst correctly identifies the physical damage from the imagery.

tasks.description: Scour social media and local news for posts, photos, or videos from the target area.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst finds multiple social media posts confirming the destruction of the target.

tasks.description: Fuse the imagery and OSINT to create a comprehensive Battle Damage Assessment (BDA) report.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst produces a report confirming mission success with evidence from multiple sources.
